posts.post_content:
I'm closing in on completing my collection of the T222 Fatima set but still need several. I am looking for PSA or SGC graded examples.

Alexander - Thanks to a fellow Board member for helping to find his Grover Alexander a new home
Austin - knocked this one off my list as well.

Only three more to go to complete my set....

Huggins (yes, I know there is one on Ebay)
Keating
Schulte

I am hoping that somebody can help me whittle down this list even more. I have a lot of T222 trading fodder (including several short print cards) as well as some 1914 Cracker Jacks that may be of interest. I am also happy to pay cash. 

Please let me know if you can help....

Bump...hopefully there are others that can help my cause.

Thanks for checking....

Hi Barry, 

You wouldn't happen to have an extra Archer would you?  It's the last one I need for the set.  I'm aware of the ones on Ebay, but looking for something a little nicer than being in two pieces or missing chunks.  

I know you said you were looking for PSA/SGC examples, but I do have an extra raw Keating.  It's in bad shape (missing a chunk), but if you want it let me know and we'll figure something out.

Good luck on the rest, especially Schulte!
Barry - would you happen to have an extra Lelivelt?
Wish I could help on the Lelivelt but that seems to be a “one per customer” type of card….best of luck finding it!

With the help of several generous members of this board I now find myself one card from completing the T222 set….

If anyone has a Schulte card they are willing to part with it would be immensely appreciated!!

[quote name="rman444" post=2520135]Barry - would you happen to have an extra Lelivelt?[/QUOTE]

I have a Lelivelt that I can make available, if it's of interest.
